entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , New Tecumseth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:26 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain showers or flurries. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this morning then changing to rain showers at times heavy near noon. Risk of freezing rain this morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this evening. A few flurries beginning late this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 8. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Cloudy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy. High plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
